ygData.subject: Re: Bard Armor was ([eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Not only that they still haven t fixed the bug that causes everyone to go linkdead if too many people (which is any more than 6 it seems) zone in at once.
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, May 18/00, "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> Sounds like a likely place to me then. I mean if you have to kill Venril
> Sathir to get an item that Summons Food, I figure you have to kill a dozen
> of them to get one the casts Gate.
>
> Having death mobs at a zone in point is stupid. Verant's technology is
> nowhere near sphisticated or reliable enough to allow a group of people to
> zone in together even if they were all on DSL or Cable-modems.

Not only that they still haven't fixed the bug that causes everyone to
go linkdead if too many people (which is any more than 6 it seems) zone
in at once.

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
